name: Random Chance Warrior
description:
You are a warrior protecting your town from hordes of enemies, they think that you are no match for them.

But you own a weapon that can be stronger than all of them combined, the warrior dice

With the warrior dice you can summon 1 of 6 items to defeat your enemies.

Sound good right?

The only thing is that you can't choose what order you get your items, or if you even get them in a battle.

I made this in about 12 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2022 (I forgot that it started until the Saturday)

It's still very buggy
